functions.name: notifyLocaleMessages
functions.description: Make the current locale's messages.json map available to an overlay extension implementing an observer for 'extension:locale-messages'.

functions.name: notifyStorageLocal
functions.description: Make local indexedDB storage available to an overlay extension implementing an observer for 'extension:storage-local'.

parameters.name: storageLocalData
parameters.description: The storage.local object for this extension.

parameters.name: startup
parameters.description: If true, we are in startup, wait for ready notification; otherwise send data.
